participant_1.name: Susan
participant_1.personality: Creative and resourceful, Susan loves to find new ways to express her artistic side. She is friendly and enjoys sharing her interests with others.
participant_1.background: Sometimes i like to visit thrift shops. I like to recycle my thrift shop finds and make new items. I like to sew my own clothing. I enjoy clothing with exotic prints. I am an art teacher.

participant_2.name: John
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and sporty, John is determined to follow in his father's footsteps. He has a keen interest in action movies and enjoys team sports.
participant_2.background: My father is a doctor. I am a college student. I like action movies. I drive a restored mustang. I play football.

content.text: Hi, I'm Susan.
Hi, I'm John.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play football and watch action movies.
I like to sew my own clothing and I enjoy thrift shopping.
That's cool. I've never been to a thrift shop before.
You should go sometime. They're really fun. You can find a lot of great deals on clothes and other items.
Maybe I will. I'm always looking for a good deal.
I also like to go to the art museum. I'm an art teacher.
Oh, that's cool. I've never been to an art museum.
You should go sometime. They're really interesting. You can see a lot of different types of art from all over the world.
Maybe I will. I'm always looking for new things to do.
I'm also a college student. What are you studying?
I'm studying business. I want to be a doctor like my dad.
That's great. I'm sure you'll be a great doctor.
Thanks. I hope so.
Well, it was nice talking to you, John.
You too, Susan. I hope we can get together again sometime.
Sure. Let's exchange numbers.
Okay.
What's your number?
My number is 555-555-5555.
Okay. I'll text you.
Okay. Bye, Susan.
Bye, John.
